mapper.select: select DISTINCT 1 as activityType,im.interact_id as activityId, im.machine_code as machineCode,m.merchant_code as sellerId, area.province,area.city,locale.`name` as locale from inno72_interact_machine im join inno72_interact_machine_goods img on im.id=img.interact_machine_id left join inno72_goods g on g.id=img.goods_id left join inno72_merchant m on g.seller_id = m.id left join inno72_machine machine on im.machine_id = machine.id left join inno72_locale locale on machine.locale_id = locale.id left join inno72_admin_area area on area.`code` = locale.area_code where img.type = 0 limit #{currIndex} , #{pageSize}

SELECT distinct 0 as activityType, ap.activity_id as activityId, m.machine_code AS machineCode,ms.merchant_code AS sellerId,area.province,area.city,l.`name` AS locale FROM inno72_activity_plan_game_result apg LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON ap.id = apg.activity_plan_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan_machine apm ON apm.activity_plan_id = apg.activity_plan_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = apm.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON g.id = apg.prize_id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant ms ON ms.id = g.seller_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.`code`=l.area_code WHERE m.machine_status = 4 AND ap.is_delete = 0 AND apg.prize_type = 1 limit #{currIndex} , #{pageSize}
